results.content: Great tutorial. It's helped me come up to speed quickly on some of the more important aspects of AngularJS development. I'm really glad I signed up for this.

results.content:
Although the ideas shown are excellent, the methodology of teaching is too fast, it should have been slower and explain in detail: WHY, HOW and WHEN of the use of Angularjs command.

For beginners it is too difficult, but for users with experience is not a problem assimilate.

results.content:
The title should be named as Mastering Angularjs for developer.
One word after finishing the course is "Awesome"!

I finished this course within 48 hours.
You did a very good job in explaining the Angularjs by using TvTracker as an example.

Here are my feedbacks to the course:

In section 1 and 2, the framework of the $http.get factory is awesome, and I am able to use the information for my existing project.

In section 3 of Custom directive, after finish the lessons, I learned so much on how to extend the HTML.

In section 4 of UI-angularjs boostrap of pagination, it is very informative, and the 4 mins. of rating directive lesson helps me to add the component into my project.

In Section 5, thanks to the course, now I understand angularjs form validation.

Overall, this course covers the information that I need to use Angulajs as my javascript framework.

results.content: I think this class contains lots of good techniques and resources. The class moves along a little faster than some of the other angular courses I have taken so I would definitely recommend a novice to take a more beginner type course first. This is the kind of class I would probably watch a few times and continue to refer back to the downloadable code when working on a project with similar challenges. Overall I think it is a great course but I wouid not recommend it as a first angular course.

results.content: I should have known better than to pay for this class, by far the worst one that I've taken on Udemy.  Other classes are much better (usually 8 - 11 hours).  The instructor here is way too fast, it's like he's reading a script, he doesn't explain anything in depth.  Essentially a waste of money!!!! Udemy needs to screen better.

results.content: The course offers a deep understanding into creating layouts using angular and angular ui. The teachers explanations are to the point and meaningful, the example app is a tv directory and you'll end up learning from the most basic ideas of two way data binding all the way to how to implement a full fledged layout using angular only. Overall the course offers a great starting point for developers wanting to get into development with Angular as well as a good refresher for veteran developers looking into stepping up their angular game.
results.content_html: The course offers a deep understanding into creating layouts using angular and angular ui. The teachers explanations are to the point and meaningful, the example app is a tv directory and you'll end up learning from the most basic ideas of two way data binding all the way to how to implement a full fledged layout using angular only. Overall the course offers a great starting point for developers wanting to get into development with Angular as well as a good refresher for veteran developers looking into stepping up their angular game.
